indicator.summary: Chaikin Oscillator is the difference between fast and slow Exponential Moving Averages (EMA) of the Accumulation/Distribution Line (ADL). See documentation for more information.
indicator.typeparam: Configurable Quote type. See Guide for more information.
indicator.param: Number of periods for the ADL fast EMA.
Number of periods for the ADL slow EMA.
indicator.returns: Time series of Chaikin Oscillator, Money Flow Volume, and ADL values.
